https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/8J7nVPqUscGC9LfeSdqZ5YC2mWX.jpg A Crowd of Three tells the story of two men, Kenta & Jun, who grew up as almost brothers at a children's facility. Kenta & Jun now works as part of a demolition crew but become fed up with their jobs. The friends then decide to take a road trip up north to visit Kenta's brother at the Abashiri prison. A Crowd of Three
